coded_answer.p: I am writing to reply to your letter in which you let me know I hadhave won the first prize in your competition.
I would like to travel in July as it is the only month in this year when I do not have any exams. I am currently attending University and I have exams all term long.
ForRegarding accommodation I would prefer a tent, as I love nature and I like going camping a lot.

AboutRegarding the two activities I have to choose I will take surfing and basketball. I know very little about surfing, it is almost something new for me. I have only practiseddone it once. But, on the other sideon the other hand, I am a good basketball player, and I practiseplay it three or four times a week as I play in the University team.
